import React from'react';import{Page,Text,View,Document,StyleSheet,PDFViewer,Font,Image}from'@react-pdf/renderer';import{Table,TableHeader,TableCell,TableBody,DataTableCell}from'@david.kucsai/react-pdf-table';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';// Create styles
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var styles=StyleSheet.create({page:{backgroundColor:'#E4E4E4',fontFamily:'Sarabun',paddingTop:35,paddingBottom:65,paddingHorizontal:35},title:{fontSize:20,textAlign:'center',marginBottom:20},container:{alignSelf:'center',marginBottom:5}});Font.register({family:'Sarabun',fonts:[{src:'./fonts/Sarabun-Regular.ttf'}]});var PdfReport=function PdfReport(){var cartLists=useSelector(function(state){return state.cartReducer.cartlist;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PDFViewer,{className:"container-fluid",height:600,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Document,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Page,{size:"A4",style:styles.page,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(View,{style:styles.container,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:"/logo192.png",style:{width:50,height:50}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(View,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{style:styles.title,children:"Shopping cart lists"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{data:cartLists,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableHeader,{textAlign:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{weighting:0.5,children:"Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Course name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Course price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Amount"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataTableCell,{weighting:0.5,style:{textAlign:'center'},getContent:function getContent(r){return r.id;}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataTableCell,{getContent:function getContent(r){return r.name;}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataTableCell,{style:{textAlign:'center'},getContent:function getContent(r){return r.qty;}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataTableCell,{style:{textAlign:'center'},getContent:function getContent(r){return r.price;}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataTableCell,{style:{textAlign:'center'},getContent:function getContent(r){return r.qty*r.price;}})]})]})]})})});};export default PdfReport;
